name: AcetaminophenChlorpheniraminePhenylephrine
title: Acetaminophen / Chlorpheniramine / Phenylephrine
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent acetaminophen / chlorpheniramine / phenylephrine combination medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Medication, Ordered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with semantic clinical drugs; generic; human use only; prescribable; acetaminophen / chlorpheniramine / phenylephrine (combination medication).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes branded drugs; components or ingredient only; non-prescribable; acetaminophen / chlorpheniramine / phenylephrine in combination with other medications.)
